aws::graph::propositions: Equity-Related Financial Data from Amazon's 10-K Filing
Equity warrant valuation losses were -2,132 in the most recent reporting period.
Equity warrant valuation gains were 26 in the middle reporting period.
Equity warrant valuation losses were -192 in the earliest reporting period.
Upward adjustments relating to equity investments in private companies were 76 in the most recent reporting period.
Upward adjustments relating to equity investments in private companies were 40 in the middle reporting period.
Upward adjustments relating to equity investments in private companies were 49 in the earliest reporting period.
Foreign currency losses were -340 in the most recent reporting period.
Foreign currency gains were 65 in the middle reporting period.
Foreign currency losses were -408 in the earliest reporting period.
Other net expenses were -540 in the most recent reporting period.
Other net expenses were -177 in the middle reporting period.
Other net expenses were -421 in the earliest reporting period.
Total other income (expense) net was -16,806 in the most recent reporting period.
Total other income (expense) net was 938 in the middle reporting period.
Total other income (expense) net was -2,250 in the earliest reporting period.
Other income (expense) net was included in financial reporting for 2022 and 2023.
